statements: SELECT * FROM gmoseeds_usage;
SELECT region_name, seed_type, usage_amount FROM gmoseeds_usage;
SELECT id, region_name, seed_type, research_purpose FROM gmoseeds_usage;
SELECT region_name, seed_type, usage_amount FROM gmoseeds_usage WHERE usage_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM gmoseeds_usage ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM gmoseeds_usage WHERE usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT id, seed_type, research_purpose FROM gmoseeds_usage WHERE region_name = 'North America' AND seed_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM gmoseeds_usage WHERE research_purpose LIKE '%nutrition%' ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(usage_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(usage_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(usage_amount) AS min_amount FROM gmoseeds_usage WHERE seed_type = 'Soybean';
SELECT id, region_name, seed_type, research_purpose FROM gmoseeds_usage WHERE seed_type IN ('Wheat', 'Rice') AND usage_amount >= 50 ORDER BY region_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM region_usage;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM region_usage ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, gmo_seed_usage FROM region_usage WHERE gmo_seed_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM seed_supplier;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM seed_supplier ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM region_usage WHERE gmo_seed_usage > 100 ORDER BY region_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT region_name, gmo_seed_usage FROM region_usage WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM seed_supplier WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM seed_supplier WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT region_name, gmo_seed_usage FROM region_usage WHERE region_name LIKE '%America%' ORDER BY gmo_seed_usage ASC;
SELECT * FROM gmo_seed_usage;
SELECT region, research_purpose FROM gmo_seed_usage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT center_name, region_name, research_purpose FROM research_centers JOIN region_details ON research_centers.region_id = region_details.region_id;
SELECT * FROM region_details WHERE continent = 'Europe';
SELECT region_name, country FROM region_details ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT * FROM region_details WHERE continent = 'Asia';
SELECT region_name, country FROM region_details WHERE country = 'USA' OR country = 'Canada';
SELECT center_name, region_name FROM research_centers JOIN region_details ON research_centers.region_id = region_details.region_id WHERE research_purpose = 'Agricultural Research';
SELECT * FROM gmo_seed_usage WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT center_name, region_name, research_purpose FROM research_centers JOIN region_details ON research_centers.region_id = region_details.region_id WHERE region_name LIKE 'North%' ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crops WHERE crop_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT seed_name, seed_id FROM seeds WHERE region_id = 2 ORDER BY seed_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM seed_usage WHERE usage_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT seed_name, crop_name, region_name, usage_date FROM seeds JOIN crops ON seeds.crop_id = crops.crop_id JOIN regions ON seeds.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT seed_name, crop_name, usage_quantity FROM seeds JOIN crops ON seeds.crop_id = crops.crop_id JOIN seed_usage ON seeds.seed_id = seed_usage.seed_id;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(seed_id) as total_seeds FROM regions LEFT JOIN seeds ON regions.region_id = seeds.region_id GROUP BY region_name;

SELECT crop_name, AVG(usage_quantity) as avg_quantity FROM crops JOIN seeds ON crops.crop_id = seeds.crop_id JOIN seed_usage ON seeds.seed_id = seed_usage.seed_id GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1
SELECT * FROM seeds ORDER BY seed_name DESC
SELECT center_name, region_name FROM research_centers JOIN regions ON research_centers.region_id = regions.region_id
SELECT researcher_name, center_name FROM researchers JOIN research_centers ON researchers.center_id = research_centers.center_id
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT seed_name, genetic_info FROM seeds WHERE seed_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT center_name, region_name FROM research_centers JOIN regions ON research_centers.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT seed_name, center_name, usage_date FROM seeds JOIN seed_usage ON seeds.seed_id = seed_usage.seed_id ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, center_name FROM researchers JOIN research_centers ON researchers.center_id = research_centers.center_id WHERE center_name = 'Research Center A';
